comment.author: 92807080@N00
comment._content: Why denote this photo as circa 1900s when the calendar clearly shows the month is September and the first three numerals of the year are 190? According to the Virtual Perpetual Calendar ( www.vpcalendar.net/Correlations/19th_Century.html ) Sept 1 fell on Saturday in the following years with zero as the third numeral: 1900 1906 After that not until 1917 did a Saturday begin the month of September. The fourth numeral may be difficult to distinguish, but it is certainly not a 6 to my eyes. .
